title: The New Ipswich
creator_credit: Australian news and Information Bureau and Eric Thompson
brief_description: The story of the way of life of the people in Ipswich, Queensland. Scenes include: the Alan Cunnigham memorial (explorer) railway workshop, woollen mill, timber mill and coal mines, schools and leisure activities. Music by Robert Hughes.
